jd: Job Description -Position :: Project Manager - OnsiteLocation : Conyers, GA-Need local candidate with DLMust haves::LinkedIn Must have Revit ExpLocal candidates !An engineering firm is seeking a Project Manager with Revit experience to join their growing team in Conyers, GA. This is a temp to hire role & 100% onsite.Responsibilities of the Project Manager:Coordinating documents submittals and meeting milestone requirements.Formatting drawings and files to allow for cloud-based file sharing.Attending video conference meetings.Qualifications of the Project Manager:Should be proficient with Autodesk Revit, AutoCAD, Microsoft Word, Excel, and Google software.Must have Revit ExpMust have excellent organizational skills using various software as well as familiarity with cloud-based communication, video conferencing, and file sharing.
